document_data.name: Steeps
document_data.mainbody: '''The Steeps''' was a district in the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]], located between the Old Wall and eastern side of [[Gray Harbor]].

Notable Locations.Businesses:
* [[Counting House]]: For centuries, this building served as the central hub for trade, commerce and currency exchange within Baldur's Gate.
* [[Felogyr's Fireworks]]
Notable Locations.Statues:
* [[Seaserpent Tamed by Umberlee]]
* [[Faithful Shopkeeper Meets the Honest Trader]]
* [[The Queen's Favor]]: This [[marble]] fountain depicted a life-size sailing ship that appeared as if it were sinking beneath waves of the ocean.
Notable Locations.Temples: * [[Water Queen's House]]: This temple to [[Umberlee]] was a popular destination for the great many Baldurians whose livelihoods depended on sailing, fishing or otherwise required the blessing of the "fickle mother" of the sea.
